definition: to rebel against orthodoxy/to depart from established practices
to leave/to part from/to be away from/(in giving distances) from/without (sth)/independent of/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing fire/☲

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

sentences.english: Every advance in civilization has been denounced as unnatural while it was recent.
sentences.chinese: 文明的每一次進步在剛開始時，都被指責爲離經叛道。

sentences.english: T he Skin Skinny When it comes to sun, Maggie is the renegade.
sentences.chinese: 皮膚保養提到陽光，瑪吉的觀點有點離經叛道。

definition: to make a show of being original or unconventional (idiom)
brush stroke to the side (calligraphy)/fig. side stroke/lateral thinking
universally shocking/to offend the whole of society
